section: The Term of this Agreement shall be for a period of [* ****] years and [*****] months commencing the 1st day of September 2004 and terminating the [*****] day of [*****].
explanation: The contract's term is not clearly defined due to redactions, creating ambiguity about the agreement's duration. The starting date is provided but the ending date is missing making it hard to enforce the contract.

section: In each and every calendar year of this Agreement, CONSULTANT shall achieve a satisfactory record of play in a minimum of [* ****] professional golf association events on the SPGA and/or PGA tour (which shall include both the PGA and SPGA Tour Skins Games). If for any reason, CONSULTANT should achieve a satisfactory record of play in less than [*****] SPGA and/or PGA tour events in a calendar year, he shall repay ADAMS GOLF an amount per event for each event under [*****] achieved in the given calendar year as follows:
explanation: The minimum number of events the consultant must play is redacted. This creates ambiguity around the consultant's performance obligations, making it hard to enforce the contract.

section: The repayment amount shall be calculated in the same way as repayment is calculated under paragraph 8A.
explanation: This text is a structural flaw because the agreement goes on to say this in both section 22 and 23. Having the same language in two different sections of the text does not make sense.
